title: aparAdhangaL
sahitya:
aparAdhangaL poruppAi kaNNA abhayam abhayam abhayam abhayam


anupallavi

  ubhaya pAdam paTrik-kaNNIr Utri uLLam uDaindEn


caraNam 1    sanmArgattai viDuttEn mana shAntattaip-pari koDuttEn
dunmArgattait-thUvenrudarat-tUya bhaktar nEyam aruLvAi
    caraNam 2    hIna sheyalgaL purindEn un iNai aDiyinai marandEn
jnAna guruvAi varuvAi enrE nambi nambi irundEn
